name: Darkness Chamber
description:
You are a short-sighted hero trapped in the dark. Find your way through the maze using your senses...

WASD to move around,

Oh, and... well... You'll find out =)

Design: Huy Ta Quang
Artist: Noel-Tien Nguyen
Developer: Binh Tran Van 

3d asset from: Cadnav.com
Sound from: freesounds, jute , copyc4t 
Texture from: textures.com
